segments.text: Ladies and gentlemen , we are heading towards the first spot of our trip-the Louvre .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wonderful . That's a place famous for its arts .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . There are so many famous paintings on show . I am sure it will be an unforgettable trip .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Surely it will be . By the way , when will we get there ?
segments.speaker: S2
